text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Those people protesting in violation of their States' ordinances and risking people's lives should go to the back of the line when they test positive for #COVID19 and need ventilators!!  Their selfishness and stupidity should NOT be rewarded!!

#MAGAts want more Americans to DIE!
